thread.title: Oscars 2017: In Memoriam Segment Reminds Us Of the Many Pop Culture Treasures We Lost In 2016
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: In Memoriam Segment Reminds Us Of the Many Pop Culture Treasures We Lost In 2016

author: Teresa Jusino
title: Oscars 2017: In Memoriam Segment Reminds Us Of the Many Pop Culture Treasures We Lost In 2016
text:
We already knew that 2016 took away far too many brilliant artists. Tonight, to the tune of Sara Bareilles singing Joni Mitchell’s “Clouds,” we got to take a moment to appreciate the talents and memories of those pop culture treasures we lost. If you missed it, check out full segment above. 
Rest in peace, and thank you all for your brilliance and creativity.
